8 Now that Ukraine is winding down where shall we funnel all our blood and treasure next? Since it 100% ain't coming to Americans. posted 54 minutes ago by BerettaStroker 2 comments award share report block My guesses are: Rebuild Gaza Regime change Venezuela Reattack Iran
